RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 60000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Last 5 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENZANCE rated along the inside under a firm hold, shifted out four wide through the upper lane and prevailed late under all out pressure. RIVOLI showed good early foot to set the early pace, dug in deep stretch and missed in a game effort. CATALINA EXPRESS prompt the early pace three deep from the outside foes and kept on willingly to the wire. LORD OF MISCHIEF was off a step slow, raced off the early pace racing just off the inside, swung wide into the upper stretch to race from the outside and raced evenly late. XKUZ was coaxed along from the inside around the far turn through the stretch and weakened. SENSE OF GOLDEN stalked the pace, raced two deep between rivals near the three eighths pole and faded. RAMBUNCTIOUS RIDE was off a step slow, void of early speed and had no rally while racing two to three wide in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Lord of Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, swung wide upper stretch, even

ENTRY.NAME: Rambunctious Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, void of speed, no rally, 2-3 wide

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE CREEK settled off the early pace near the inside, moved up through the far turn, angled wide into the upper stretch to circle the field from the far outside and proved best under strong handling. SASSE'S CLASS prompt the early pace while racing near the rail, dug in deep stretch and kept on gamely to the wire. STARLIFTER exchanged bumps with Street Rockin in the early stages, raced off the early going and rallied willingly while racing from the outside in the drive. YAHMO tracked the early pace from the inside under a firm hold, angled through the upper stretch and moved up to improve position. STREET ROCKIN exchanged bump early on, stalked the pace from the outside of rivals, raced four wide into the upper stretch and weakened. WORK HARD was unhurried early, saved ground and had no late rally. WILMA FLINTSHIRE showed good early foot to set a pressured pace three deep and gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, angled wide upper, surged, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 3 1 1/8M Inner turf CR: 84. Claiming Purse 34500. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Condition Eligibility). (Rail at 37 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINGAL was bumped soundly at the start, raced near the back of the pack early on while racing in hand, waited for racing room near the five sixteenths pole, split rivals and finished strongly to draw clear under steady handling racing four deep. FAST PAYDAY stalked the pace, raced two deep between rivals near the five sixteenths pole and finished gamely in the stretch run to secure second place while racing three deep. RECONVENE showed good early foot from the inside to set the early pace and weakened a bit the final eighth of a mile. C MY MEISTER was bumped soundly at the start, tracked the early leaders two deep and weakened in the drive. JUST DEAL WITH IT settled off the early going, raced four to three wide in the drive and lacked a rally. HOMETOWN HERO dropped back off the early pace, raced four wide through the far turn and had no late rally. ASSERT DOMINANCE was pulling early under a snug hold early on along the inside and faded. ERLAN was bumped at the break, raced mid pack early on, was four deep into the upper stretch and tired.

VOCALIZE was bumped at the break, raced off the early pace, raced four to three wide in the lane, split rivals nearing the sixteenth pole and finished gamely to the wire. WHENIGETTOHEAVEN stalked the pace, moved up three wide through the far turn, led deep stretch and missed in a game effort.
